text: Nanso, Ahasia nuabaa Yehoseba11.2 Ɛsono Yehoseba ne maame na ɛsono Atalia nso ne maame. Na Yehoseba yɛ Ɔsɔfopanin Yehoia yere (2 Be 22.11). Ɛno enti na ɔtumi de Yoas siee Asɔredan mu a na ɛyɛ ɔsɔfoɔ no mpiam no. a na ɔyɛ ɔhene Yehoram babaa no faa Ahasia ba abarimaa ketewa Yoas, yii no firii ɔhene no mma a anka wɔrebɛkunkum wɔn no mu. Yehoseba de Yoas ne ne bagyegyefoɔ kɔhintaa pia bi mu, sɛdeɛ Atalia renhunu no. Ɛno enti, wɔannya abɔfra no ankum no.
